name: FACT OR WACK movies
description:
Trivia with a Cinematic Twist! Fact or Wack movies is the ultimate time attack trivia game with some surprises thrown in. Twelve challenging and hilarious levels with tons of questions. Try your best to ace every question on each level while racing against the timer. Try to tackle a huge variety of movie questions from classic films all the way up to the present blockbusters. To pass a level you have to get 100% and beat the timer. If you're fast and smart you just might survive!!!!
Check out the Original Fact or Wack as well!
